kubejs.ponder.intro.text_1: Welcome to your newly aquired automaton!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_2: Our new models can help you achieve your dreams!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_3: The following are important features you should learn before embaking on your exciting new extra terastrial activity!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_5: The automaton has powerful arms that can break any block!
kubejs.ponder.intro.text_6: The automaton does not eat, does not sleep, and does not break! (terms may apply, no warranty)
